Liushutong characters (3)

峝字的基本解释

峝
tóng
同“峒”。

峝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tóng］
［《廣韻》徒紅切，平東，定。］
山名用字。见“崆峒”。
峒2［dòng］
［《廣韻》徒弄切，去送，定。］
亦作“峝1”。
(1)山洞。
(2)旧时对我国西南地区部分少数民族聚居地方的泛称。如苗族的苗峒、侗族的十峒、壮族的黄峒等。后来逐渐演变为今侗族。参见“峒2丁”、“峒2人”。
(3)宋代以后羁縻州辖属的行政单位。大者称州，小者称县，又小者称峒。
(4)解放前海南岛黎族的一种政治组织。有固定的地区。黎语称“贡”。解放后已废除。
(5)见“崆峒”。

峝字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峝； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页311第05
【字彙補】徒弄切，音洞。峝人，苗類。一曰峝蠻。見【諸苗考】。

峝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
峝字的起名意思

同“峒”，如崆峒，山名。

Basic explanation of words
Col
tóng
Same as "dong".
Col
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tóng］
["Guangyun" Tu Hongqi, Pingdong, Ding. ]
The name of the mountain is written in words. See "Kongtong".
Dong 2 [dòng]
["Guangyun" just cut it, send it off, set it. ]
Also known as "Ao 1".
(1) The cave.
(2) The old general term for some places where ethnic minorities live in Southwest my country. Such as the Miaodong of the Miao nationality, the Shidong of the Dong nationality, and the Huangdong of the Zhuang nationality. Later it gradually evolved into the present Dong nationality. See "dong 2 ding", "dong 2 people".
(3) Administrative units under the jurisdiction of Jimi Prefecture after the Song Dynasty. The big one is called the state, the small one is called the county, and the small one is called Dong.
(4) A political organization of the Li nationality in Hainan Island before liberation. There are fixed areas. Li language is called "gong". It has been abolished after liberation.
(5) See "Kongtong".
Col
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峝; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 311 05
【Vocabulary Supplement】It's just to cut, sound hole. Au people, seedlings. One said au man. See 【Zhu Miao Kao】.
